m_vList.NAME: Explore Albus
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースノタンサク
m_vList.DESC: Go explore Albus.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: Encounter
m_vList.KANA: デアイ
m_vList.DESC: Invite Sorel to go out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 2
m_vList.KANA: デアイ2
m_vList.DESC: Hazel commissions you to meet the janitor Oregano.
m_vList.CONDITION: Walk from the "Entrance of the Academy" towards south and cross the bridge, then you can find "Oregano's Cabin". Go to "Oregano's Cabin".

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 3
m_vList.KANA: デアイ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that has appeared near "Oregano's home"./[Location] South of the "Entrance of the Academy", across the bridge.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Wolf Prowling in Front of the Cabin" that has appeared near "Oregano's Cabin".

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 4
m_vList.KANA: デアイ4
m_vList.DESC: Enter the "Lost Woods" to gather herbal medicine.
m_vList.CONDITION: Set off for the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 5
m_vList.KANA: デアイ5
m_vList.DESC: After parting from Cresson, set off for the depths of the "Lost Woods" to gather herbal medicine./[Location] Just follow Peppermint's guidance.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go deep into the "Lost Woods" and go to the "White Lotus Pool"./Enter the depths of the woods following the fairy's guidance.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 6
m_vList.KANA: デアイ6
m_vList.DESC: A swarm of monsters showed up in the "White Lotus Pool"! Go repel them./[Location] The depths of the "Lost Woods".
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Wolf Boss of a Small Wolf Pack" that has appeared in the "White Lotus Pool".

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 7
m_vList.KANA: デアイ7
m_vList.DESC: Send the girl found in the depths of the "Lost Woods" back to the "Academy".
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Marjoram in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Go with Marjoram Sensei to check on the girl's status.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Marjoram in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 2
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the monster in the "White Lotus Pool" and gain the ingredient for the "Medicine of Awakening".
m_vList.CONDITION: Enter the depths of the "Lost Woods" and go to the "White Lotus Pool".

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 3
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster in the "White Lotus Pool" and gain the ingredient for the "Medicine of Awakening".
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Lone Goblin" that has appeared in the "White Lotus Pool".

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 4
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Medicine of Awakening" and give it to Marjoram Sensei in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Medicine of Awakening" to Marjoram./The ingredients are "Mysterious Milk", "Water Lily" and "Morning Dew Drop"./"Mysterious Milk" can be gained from "Goblins".

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ
m_vList.DESC: Invite Wistyria to have meals with you.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream 2
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to "Ruhuna" to confirm the details of the Goblins elimination mission.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to "Ruhuna" located east of the entrance of the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream 3
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ3
m_vList.DESC: Find the "Goblins' Den" in the "Lost Woods"./[Location] Keep walking forward after entering the "Lost Woods".
m_vList.CONDITION: Enter the "Goblins' Den" in the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream 4
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ4
m_vList.DESC: Find the "Red Cap" inhabiting the "Goblins' Den"./[Location] Keep walking forward after entering the "Lost Woods".
m_vList.CONDITION: Find the "Red Cap" on 5F of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream 5
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ5
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the "Red Cap" inhabiting the "Goblins' Den".
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Avaricious Red Cap" that has appeared on 5F of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: The Omen in the Dream 6
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ6
m_vList.DESC: Report the defeat of the "Red Cap" to Bilberry.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to "Ruhuna" located east of the entrance of the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン
m_vList.DESC: Go explore Albus.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 2
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン2
m_vList.DESC: Go ask Queen Cuphea sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Talk to Queen Cuphea sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne" on the top of the big tree.

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 3
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン3
m_vList.DESC: Go to the "Glittering Hill" as Queen Cuphea suggested./[Location] Set off from the Gate of the "Fairyland" to the east.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Enter the dungeon "Glittering Hill" located east of the entrance of the "Fairyland" (hill foot).

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 4
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン4
m_vList.DESC: You encountered a monster as soon as you enter the "Glittering Hill"! Repel them.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Defeat the "Afanc Lurking in the Dark" that has appeared in the "Glittering Hill".

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 5
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン5
m_vList.DESC: Head for the depths of the "Glittering Hill" as Queen Cuphea suggested.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Head for "Glittering Hill" 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Head Toward the World
m_vList.KANA: セカイヘノハバタキ
m_vList.DESC: Go to the Academy to talk to Bergamot Sensei.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Bergamot in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Head Toward the World 2
m_vList.KANA: セカイヘノハバタキ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Book of Magic" required for the exam and get the approval for the short-term study abroad program.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Book of Magic" to Bergamot./The ingredients are "Japanese Ash Branch", "Puniball?", "Heath Grass" and "Water Lily".

m_vList.NAME: The Girl Carrying Things
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Ribrum! Head forward and explore along the path.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Set off from the "Wharf" to the northeast.

m_vList.NAME: The Girl Carrying Things 2
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ2
m_vList.DESC: Catch up with the girl carrying the painting.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Set off from "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum to the east.

m_vList.NAME: The Girl Carrying Things 3
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster and rescue the girl.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Red Puni Attacking the Girl" at the east of "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Girl Carrying Things 4
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ4
m_vList.DESC: Go with Angelica to "Rose Hip Mansion" where the Lord of Ribrum lives.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the garden of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel seems to have come up with something. Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 2
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ2
m_vList.DESC: Find the caravan in Ribrum to get the ingredient for the medicine.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Find Feverfew somewhere in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 3
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ3
m_vList.DESC: Collect "Green Apples" for Feverfew to exchange for the material.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give "Green Apple" x2 to Feverfew who is at the entrance of "Woofer".

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 4
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Tonic" and send it to Angelica in "Woofer".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Tonic" to Angelica in "Woofer".

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ
m_vList.DESC: You met Angelica again at "Rosa Maze", but she seemed a bit weird? Something is wrong?
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 2
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ2
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rose Hip might be in danger. Rush to "Rose Hip Mansion".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 3
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that has appeared in "Rose Hip Mansion".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Cockatrice Attacking Rose Hip Mansion" that has appeared in "Rose Hip Mansion".

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 4
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Burnt-Out Paint" and give it to Lord Rose Hip.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Burnt-Out Paint" to Rose Hip./The ingredients are "Muscat", "Blue Neutralizer", "Morning Dew Drop" and "Fully-Ripe Apple".

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ
m_vList.DESC: Follow Ekinasea to the "Ward of Brambles"./[Location] Investigate the stone tablet in the depths of "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Investigate the back of the stone tablet in the depths of "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum and enter the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 2
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ2
m_vList.DESC: Go deep into the "Ward of Brambles" and find Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Find Ekinasea on 5F of the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 3
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster summoned by Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat "Ekinasea's Masterpiece Cockatrice" on 5F of the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 4
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ4
m_vList.DESC: You accepted the invitation from Lord Rose Hip. Go to "Rose Hip Mansion".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Hardworking Wistyria
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ
m_vList.DESC: Wistyria is learning hard on something. Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Hardworking Wistyria 2
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ2
m_vList.DESC: Enter the "Lost Woods" to find the relic.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Enter the depths of the "Lost Woods" and go to the "White Lotus Pool".

m_vList.NAME: The Hardworking Wistyria 3
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ3
m_vList.DESC: You are surrounded by monsters! Defeat them.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Puni Puni Wearing an Aura" that has appeared in the "White Lotus Pool".

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ
m_vList.DESC: Go find the shop of ore craftwork.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the booth at the northeast of the walled town "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 2
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ2
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the entrance of the residence at the northwest of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria. Enter from "Gooru - West Gate" and go north at the first crossing to find it.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 3
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ3
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the well at the south of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 4
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ4
m_vList.DESC: The arrow accidentally hit a monster!? Defeat it.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Tearful Red Ooze" that has appeared in front of the well at the south of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 5
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ5
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the entrance of the residence at the southeast of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria. Walk east from the well at the south.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 6
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ6
m_vList.DESC: Go retrieve the student ID card from Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the entrance of the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 7
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ7
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Bandits who obstruct you from entering the Trading House.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Doorkeeper Bandit" in front of the "Trading House" at the center of Gooru.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ
m_vList.DESC: Varerian is looking for you. Visit the "Trading House" in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior 2
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the "troublemaker".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the entrance of the residence at the northwest of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior 3
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ3
m_vList.DESC: Go to the "Calcus Graveyard" to meet Red Clover.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Red Clover in the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク
m_vList.DESC: Varerian is looking for you. Visit the "Trading House" in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 2
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク2
m_vList.DESC: Go to the "Rupes Deserted Mine"./[Location] The entrance of the mine is north of the north gate of the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Head for "Rupes Deserted Mine" 5F./The entrance of the "Rupes Deserted Mine" is north of "Gooru - North Gate".

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 3
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster in the depths of the "Rupes Deserted Mine".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Treasure Collector Giant Yellow Puni" on 5F of the "Rupes Deserted Mine".

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 4
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク4
m_vList.DESC: Give the "Mask" and the "Glass" to Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ
m_vList.DESC: Varerian seems a bit weird. Talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 2
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ2
m_vList.DESC: Rush to the "Hideout of the Dardala Company".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Enter the "Hideout of the Dardala Company" in the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 3
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monsters attacking Scalcap and his men.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat "A Swarm of Gray Spiders" that have appeared in the "Hideout of the Dardala Company".

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 4
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ4
m_vList.DESC: Defeat Black Korsh who revealed his true nature.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Traitor Black Korsh" that has appeared in the "Hideout of the Dardala Company".

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 5
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ5
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Scalcap at the "Trading House".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Scalcap at the "Trading House".

m_vList.NAME: Cheer Wistyria Up
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアヘノゲキレイ
m_vList.DESC: Wistyria is studying hard for the upcoming transfer exam of the Academy, but she is quite nervous about it. Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Cheer Wistyria Up 2
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアヘノゲキレイ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to "Ribrum" to gather the ore needed to make the amulet that can bless Wistyria for the exam.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Investigate the northeast corner of the "Wharf".

m_vList.NAME: Cheer Wistyria Up 3
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアヘノゲキレイ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster who obstructs you from gathering the ore.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Gluttonous Gray Frog" that has appeared at the "Wharf".

m_vList.NAME: Cheer Wistyria Up 4
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアヘノゲキレイ4
m_vList.DESC: Give the amulet to Wistyria
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: With the Sea Breeze
m_vList.KANA: シオカゼトトモニ
m_vList.DESC: Wistyria has passed the transfer exam of the Academy and completed the transfer ceremony. Go meet her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: With the Sea Breeze 2
m_vList.KANA: シオカゼトトモニ2
m_vList.DESC: Go with everyone to "Ruhuna" to enjoy the delicious food.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: With the Sea Breeze 3
m_vList.KANA: シオカゼトトモニ3
m_vList.DESC: The skill book of the "Alchemy of Water" seems to belong to the Lord of Eruleum. Go meet him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the port city of "Lactus"./The port city of "Lactus" is located across the bridge south of the "Lactus Street".

m_vList.NAME: The Rumor of the Ghost Ship
m_vList.KANA: ユウレイセンノウワサ
m_vList.DESC: The Lord of Eruleum Golden Rod seems to need more help. Go meet him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: The Rumor of the Ghost Ship 2
m_vList.KANA: ユウレイセンノウワサ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to the place where Lord Rod said the ghost ship is haunting.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the "Offshore Island" at night./The "Offshore Island" refers to the island on the "Pisque Coast" at the west of Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: The Rumor of the Ghost Ship 3
m_vList.KANA: ユウレイセンノウワサ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat Verbena's subordinate and ask him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat "Verbena's Subordinate Pirate " that has appeared on the "Offshore Island" at night./The "Offshore Island" refers to the island on the "Pisque Coast" at the west of Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: Captain Verbena
m_vList.KANA: フナオサベルベイヌ
m_vList.DESC: Anise seems to know something about the "Crown of the Blue Sea".
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Anise in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Captain Verbena 2
m_vList.KANA: フナオサベルベイヌ2
m_vList.DESC: The "Crown of the Blue Sea" seems to be on the "Lapis Coast". Set off from "Lactus" to the west.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the "Lapis Coast" at night.

m_vList.NAME: Captain Verbena 3
m_vList.KANA: フナオサベルベイヌ3
m_vList.DESC: These monsters seem to be guarding some treasure carefully. Defeat them.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat the "Big Skeleton Guarding the Treasure" who only appears on the "Lapis Coast" at night.

m_vList.NAME: Captain Verbena 4
m_vList.KANA: フナオサベルベイヌ4
m_vList.DESC: The "Crown of the Blue Sea" is tattered? Go to Verbena for help.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the "Offshore Island" at night./The "Offshore Island" refers to the island on the "Pisque Coast" at the west of Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: Captain Verbena 5
m_vList.KANA: フナオサベルベイヌ5
m_vList.DESC: Take Verbena to Lord Rod.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the port city of "Lactus"./"Lactus" is located across the bridge south of the "Lactus Suburban Square".

m_vList.NAME: Wish to Meet the Mermaid
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョヒメニアイタクテ
m_vList.DESC: It's said that Lord Rod, who has an extraordinary passion for the mermaid, is planning the next move. Go to the port city of "Lactus" and ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: Wish to Meet the Mermaid 2
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョヒメニアイタクテ2
m_vList.DESC: The mermaid was Lord Rod's first love!? Following the clue provided by Verbena, go to the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" on the Pisque Coast.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" 1F./The "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" is located southeast of the "Pisque Coast".

m_vList.NAME: Wish to Meet the Mermaid 3
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョヒメニアイタクテ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that attacked you on 1F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat the "Guard of the Undersea Shrine - Big Grindylow (Lv.35)" that has appeared on 1F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".

m_vList.NAME: Wish to Meet the Mermaid 4
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョヒメニアイタクテ4
m_vList.DESC: Go deep into the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" to search for the mermaid.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Wish to Meet the Mermaid 5
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョヒメニアイタクテ5
m_vList.DESC: You bumped into a group of monsters in the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia". Defeat them.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat the "Undersea Monsters - Grindylows (Lv.38)" that has appeared on 5F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".

m_vList.NAME: The Fairy King's Melancholy

m_vList.DESC: Go to Fairyland to meet the Fairy King Thunbergia.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Talk to the Fairy King Thunbergia sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne" on the top of the big tree.

m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイオウノユウウツ2
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monsters that ravage Fairyland.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Defeat 3 "Imps Ravaging Fairyland".

m_vList.NAME: Cuphea's Illness
m_vList.KANA: クフェアノヤマイ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Fairyland to meet Queen Cuphea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Talk to Queen Cuphea sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne" on the top of the big tree.

m_vList.KANA: クフェアノヤマイ2
m_vList.DESC: Give the medicine that can cure colds to Queen Cuphea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Give the cuisine "Leek Soup" with a quality of at least 30 to Queen Cuphea sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne" on the top of the big tree.

m_vList.DESC: Hmm? Peppermint is gone. Go find her.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go talk to the fairy Hop near the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.KANA: ホップノクンレン2
m_vList.DESC: Help Hop with her training!
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat 4 "Puni Punis Used for the Training".

m_vList.NAME: Silver Birch's Ideal
m_vList.KANA: シルバーバーチノリソウ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Silver Birch Sensei.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Silver Birch in the Academy.

m_vList.KANA: シルバーバーチノリソウ2
m_vList.DESC: Go gather the material that Silver Birch Sensei wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Puniball?" x1 to Silver Birch in the Academy./The monster "Puni Puni?" near the Academy may drop this kind of rare material.

m_vList.NAME: [Trial] Glittering Hill
m_vList.KANA: シレンキラメクコヤマ
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Upper Floor Boss Giant Puni"./[Special Reward] Unlock the middle floors of the dungeon (11F–20F) and the lower floors of the dungeon (21F–30F).
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Defeat the "Upper Floor Boss Giant Puni" that has appeared on B10F of the "Glittering Hill".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Healing Salve
m_vList.KANA: コウカンヒーリングサルブノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Healing Salve" x2 for "Mental Water" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Healing Salve" x2./The ingredients are "Heath Grass" and "Morning Dew Drop"./"Morning Dew Drops" can only be gathered in the morning.

m_vList.NAME: Ferry to Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムチホウヘノワタシブネ
m_vList.DESC: To go to Ribrum, go find the boatman in the "White Lotus Pool".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the "White Lotus Pool" in the depths of the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: Ferry to Ribrum 2
m_vList.KANA: リブルムチホウヘノワタシブネ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Lumber" for the boatman to repair the boat.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Give the "Lumber" to the boatman in the "White Lotus Pool"./The ingredients are "Japanese Ash Branch" and "Toad Oil".

m_vList.NAME: First Visit to Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: ハジメテノリブルムチホウ
m_vList.DESC: You can now visit Ribrum. Let's go.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Take the ferry from the "White Lotus Pool" to Ribrum, and then go northeast.

m_vList.NAME: The Trees in Albus
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースノキ
m_vList.DESC: Go ask about the details of the wood collection mission.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Talk to the male merchant at the entrance of "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: The Trees in Albus 2
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースノキ2
m_vList.DESC: Give him the "Japanese Ash Branch", which can be gathered in Albus.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Give the "Japanese Ash Branch" with a quality of at least 30 to the male merchant at the entrance of "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.10
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル10
m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared at the entrance of "Ruhuna"./※Multiplayer monsters are stronger than usual ones!
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared at the entrance of "Ruhuna"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.NAME: [Practice] Gain Fish Cuisine
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウサカナリョウリノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to make the cuisine "Fish&Chips" using "Cods". "Fish&Chips" can be used for character cultivation.
m_vList.CONDITION: The ingredients are "Cod", "Potato" and "Wheat"./"Cods" can be caught in Ribrum./"Potatoes" can be gathered from the grass in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Bread
m_vList.KANA: コウカンパンノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Bread" x2 for "Morning Dew Drop" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Bread" x2./The ingredients are "Wheat" and "Walnut"./Both of them can be gathered in Albus.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Medicine
m_vList.KANA: コウカンクスリノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Medicine of Awakening" x2 for "Detox Medicine" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Medicine of Awakening" x2./The ingredients are "Mysterious Milk", "Water Lily" and "Morning Dew Drop".

m_vList.NAME: Go to Angelica's Home
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノイエヘ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Angelica's home in "Woofer".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to "Woofer" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Produce New Wine
m_vList.KANA: シンショウヒンノワインヲ
m_vList.DESC: You received a commission from a local of Woofer. Go there to learn the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Talk to the woman living in "Woofer".

m_vList.NAME: Produce New Wine 2
m_vList.KANA: シンショウヒンノワインヲ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Wine" using alchemy and give it to her!
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Wine" to the woman living in "Woofer".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Grape Juice
m_vList.KANA: コウカンブドウジュースノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Grape Juice" x2 for "Bomb" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Deliver "Grape Juice" x2./The ingredients are "Muscat" and "Fully-Ripe Grape"./Both of them can be gathered in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Wine
m_vList.KANA: コウカンワインノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Wine" x2 for "Ice Bomb" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Wine" x2./The ingredients are "Muscat", "Fully-Ripe Grape" and "Red Puniballs"./The recipe can be gained from the quest "Produce New Wine".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Fluffy Fur
m_vList.KANA: コウカンモコモコノケガワノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Fluffy Fur" x2 for "Detox Medicine" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Fluffy Fur" x2./They can be gathered from the rabbits in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Cleanup of Rosa Maze
m_vList.KANA: バラメイキュウノオオソウジ
m_vList.DESC: To receive the commission from the minstrel Catnip, go wait in front of "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Cleanup of Rosa Maze 2
m_vList.KANA: バラメイキュウノオオソウジ2
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that has appeared in "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat 5 "Myconids Overflowing from the Maze" that have appeared in "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.KANA: オネムノガクエンチョウ
m_vList.DESC: Jones Wort Sensei seems to be sleepy... What's wrong?
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Jones Wort in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sleepy Headmaster 2
m_vList.KANA: オネムノガクエンチョウ2
m_vList.DESC: Give a refreshing drink to Jones Wort Sensei.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Fresh Leaf Tea" to Jones Wort in the Academy./The ingredients are "Fresh Leaf", "Honey" and "Morning Dew Drop".

m_vList.KANA: キャットニップノウタ
m_vList.DESC: Is Catnip also going to sing in "Rosa Maze" today? Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Talk to Catnip in "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.NAME: Catnip's Song 2
m_vList.KANA: キャットニップノウタ2
m_vList.DESC: Make an item that can recover Catnip's throat.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Honey Drop" to Catnip in "Rosa Maze"./The ingredients are "Mysterious Milk", "Honey" and "Puniball".

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.15
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル15
m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared in "Path 1 of Ribrum". "Path 1 of Ribrum" is located east of the "Wharf".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared in "Path 1 of Ribrum"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.NAME: [Practice] Gain the Red Intermediate Ingredient
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウアカイチュウカンソザイノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the "Red Neutralizer". Neutralizers can be used in all kinds of syntheses. You can prepare more of them.
m_vList.CONDITION: The ingredients are "Gelatine" and "Obsidian"./"Gelatines" can be gained from Puni Punis./"Obsidians" can be gathered from stones.

m_vList.KANA: レンシュウフラムノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the "Bomb". Bombs can be used in battles, as well as to destroy the fallen trees or barrels on the field.
m_vList.CONDITION: The ingredients are "Red Neutralizer", "Obsidian" and "Japanese Ash Branch"./"Red Neutralizers" can be synthesized using "Gelatines" and "Obsidians".

m_vList.NAME: [Practice] Gain Ice Bomb
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウレヘルンノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the "Ice Bomb". Ice Bombs can be used in battles, as well as to freeze the rivers on the field.
m_vList.CONDITION: The ingredients are "Red Neutralizer", "Ice-Cold Stone" and "Japanese Ash Branch"./"Red Neutralizers" can be synthesized using "Gelatines" and "Obsidians".

m_vList.DESC: Angelica seems to be lost. Go to "Woofer" now.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to "Woofer" in Ribrum.

m_vList.KANA: オネエチャンヲサガシテ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster who wants to attack Angelica.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Cockatrice Jumping out From the Painting" that has appeared in "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Rose Petal" x2./They can be gathered from the flowers in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Blue Neutralizer
m_vList.KANA: コウカンチュウワザイアオノノウヒン

m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Blue Neutralizer" x2./The ingredients are "Gelatine" and "Fish Scale".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Mushroom

m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Mushroom" x2 for "Honey" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Mushroom" x2./They can be gathered from the mushrooms in Ribrum.

m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ5
m_vList.DESC: Invite Sorel to explore with you.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Upper Floor Boss Treant" on B10F of the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: The Rosa Maze Incident

m_vList.DESC: To receive the commission from the minstrel Catnip, go wait in front of "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Talk to Catnip in "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.KANA: ローサメイズジヘン2
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that has appeared in "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat 5 "Numbing Myconids Overflowing from the Maze" that have appeared in "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.DESC: Feverfew seems to have come to Ribrum. Go greet him.

m_vList.DESC: Prepare the products for sale for Fever Weaver.

m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Puni Essence" x2 for "Treant's Branch" x1, one time only.

m_vList.NAME: Dreams of Each Other

m_vList.DESC: You received a commission from a local boy of Woofer. Go there to learn the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to "Woofer" in Ribrum.

m_vList.KANA: オタガイノユメ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Zettel" and give it to the boy.

m_vList.DESC: Go meet Rose Hip.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Mental Water" with a quality of at least 30 to Netl at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion".

m_vList.NAME: Netl Making Desserts

m_vList.DESC: You received a commission from Netl. Go to "Rose Hip Mansion" to learn the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.DESC: Collect the ingredient for the dessert that Netl wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give "Wheat" x2 to Netl at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion"./They can be gathered from the grass in Albus.

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.20

m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared in "Path 2 of Ribrum".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared in "Path 2 of Ribrum"./Disastrous monsters only appear in "Multi" mode.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Walk northeast along the road starting from the entrance of "Woofer", and then walk east along "Path 3 of Ribrum" to go to Ateria.

m_vList.KANA: コウカンマホウノショノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange the "Book of Magic" for the recipe of "Iron Ingot", one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver the "Book of Magic"./The ingredients are "Japanese Ash Branch", "Puniball?", "Heath Grass" and "Water Lily".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Puniball?
m_vList.KANA: コウカンプニタマハテナノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Puniball?" x2 for "Mental Bottle" x2, one time only.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Golden Puniball

m_vList.DESC: Go meet Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Warrior of Love

m_vList.DESC: Varerian is looking for you. Visit the "Trading House" in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Warrior of Love 2
m_vList.KANA: アイノセンシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the "troublemaker".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the well at the south of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Warrior of Love 3
m_vList.KANA: アイノセンシ3
m_vList.DESC: You were attacked by the fleeing Bandits! Defeat them and calm them down.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Fleeing Bandits" that have appeared in front of the well at the south of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Power of Machines
m_vList.KANA: キカイノチカラデ
m_vList.DESC: Go to the Trading House of Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Power of Machines 2
m_vList.KANA: キカイノチカラデ2
m_vList.DESC: Go collect the material for repairing the machine.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Give "Scrap Iron" x2 to the man in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria./They can be gained from the "Red Cap" that appears above 11F of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.DESC: You can exchange the "Iron Ingot" for the "Good Leather", one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver the "Iron Ingot"./The ingredients are "Iron Ore", "Heavy Ore" and "Fluorspar".

m_vList.DESC: Bilberry is in the Trading House of Ateria. It seems he is traveling. Go meet him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Bilberry in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Give the "Healing Salve" with a quality of at least 60 (★3) to Bilberry in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコウミャク2
m_vList.DESC: Go gain the item that can destroy rocks.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Give the "Bomb" to the man in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Present-Day Ekinasea

m_vList.DESC: Go meet Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Rose Hip Mansion, Ribrum] Talk to Ekinasea at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.DESC: Give the paint to Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Burnt-Out Paint" to Ekinasea at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" in Ribrum.

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.KANA: コウカンレザーノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange the "Leather" for the "Good Cloth", one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver the "Leather"./The ingredients are "Beast Skin", "Fluffy Feather" and "Fluffy Fur".

m_vList.NAME: The Worrying Varerian
m_vList.KANA: ナヤメルヴァレリアン
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.KANA: ソッキョウキモダメシタイカイ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Cresson.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Cresson in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Improvisational Boldness Tournament 2
m_vList.KANA: ソッキョウキモダメシタイカイ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to the "Calcus Graveyard" in Ateria to participate in the Boldness Tournament.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the "Calcus Graveyard" at night.

m_vList.NAME: The Improvisational Boldness Tournament 3
m_vList.KANA: ソッキョウキモダメシタイカイ3
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the monster that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard" in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Scary Jack-o'-Lantern" that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル30
m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared in the "Rupes Deserted Mine".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared in the depths of the "Rupes Deserted Mine"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.NAME: The Transfer Exam is Approaching!
m_vList.KANA: テンニュウシケンセマル
m_vList.DESC: Talk to the nervous Wistyria.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Fairies and Oregano
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイトオレガノ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Oregano.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Talk to Oregano in "Oregano's Cabin".

m_vList.NAME: Fairies and Oregano 2
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイトオレガノ2
m_vList.DESC: Give the material from Fairyland to Oregano.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Give the "Fairy Butter" to Oregano in "Oregano's Cabin".

m_vList.NAME: The Emperor Bilberry
m_vList.KANA: テイオウビルベリー
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Bilberry
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Talk to Bilberry in "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: The Emperor Bilberry 2
m_vList.KANA: テイオウビルベリー2
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Goblins for Bilberry.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat 3 "Upper Floor Boss Red Caps" on 10F of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: The Emperor Bilberry 3
m_vList.KANA: テイオウビルベリー3
m_vList.DESC: Report to Bilberry.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Talk to Bilberry in "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.35

m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared on 5F of the "Hideout of the Dardala Company"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.NAME: The Black Wind of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Varerian in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the monster inhabiting the "Calcus Graveyard".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: The Black Wind of Ateria 3
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ3
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the monster inhabiting the "Calcus Graveyard".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Hobgoblin Wearing an Aura" that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: The Black Wind of Ateria 4
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ4
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Scalcap and report the result of the hunt.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Black Wind of Ateria 5
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ5
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the item Scalcap wants and give it to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Give "Sword of Albus" x1 to Scalcap in front of the "Trading House"./The ingredients can be gained in the "Goblins' Den" in Albus.

m_vList.NAME: The Black Wind of Ateria 6
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコクフウ6
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Visit the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Monster Hunt of the Dardala Company
m_vList.KANA: ダルダラマモノタイジ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to Scalcap in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Monster Hunt of the Dardala Company 2
m_vList.KANA: ダルダラマモノタイジ2
m_vList.DESC: Accept the commission from Scalcap to defeat the monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Roaming Gray Spider (Lv.40)" near the "Rupes Deserted Mine".

m_vList.NAME: Red Blade Flash
m_vList.KANA: アカキツルギヒラメキ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet the Member of the Dardala Company in the "Trading House".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Talk to the Rogue in the "Trading House" at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Red Blade Flash 2
m_vList.KANA: アカキツルギヒラメキ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the monster that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: Red Blade Flash 3
m_vList.KANA: アカキツルギヒラメキ3
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the monster that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Proliferating Numbing Myconid (Lv.40)" that has appeared in the "Calcus Graveyard".

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.40
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル40
m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared in the "Arter Tunnel".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared in the "Arter Tunnel"./The monster will appear only when you choose the "Multi" option to explore.

m_vList.NAME: [Trial] Hideout of the Dardala Company
m_vList.KANA: シレンダルダラダンアジト
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Upper Floor Boss Thief Master"./[Special Reward] Unlock the middle floors of the dungeon (11F–20F) and the lower floors of the dungeon (21F–30F).
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Upper Floor Boss Thief Master (Lv.30)" on 10F of the "Hideout of the Dardala Company".

m_vList.NAME: First Visit to Eruleum
m_vList.KANA: ハジメテノエルレウムチホウ
m_vList.DESC: Now you can visit Eruleum from the "Mountain Path" in Ateria. Walk through the "Arter Tunnel" and go to Eruleum.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Walk through the "Arter Tunnel" on the "Mountain Path" at the south of Ateria and go to the "Lactus Street" in Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: Golden Rod's Personalities
m_vList.KANA: ゴールデンロッドノヒトガラ
m_vList.DESC: What kind of person is the Lord of Eruleum Golden Rod? Go make an investigation.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the "Lactus Suburban Square" near the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: Golden Rod's Personalities 2
m_vList.KANA: ゴールデンロッドノヒトガラ2
m_vList.DESC: Give the "Good Polishing Powder" to Lord Rod to get a discount on the skill book of the "Alchemy of Water".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Give the "Good Golden Polishing Powder" to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus"./The ingredients are "Fest" and "Iron Ore"./"Fests" can be gathered from the stones in Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: The Anxious Varerian
m_vList.KANA: アセルヴァレリアン
m_vList.DESC: Varerian is screaming while running around... He looks a bit scary, but let's go ask him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Varerian in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Anxious Varerian 2
m_vList.KANA: アセルヴァレリアン2
m_vList.DESC: Give the hair-caring item to Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Good or above Drop of Dark Lilies" to Varerian in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Student Union President Hazel
m_vList.KANA: セイトカイチョウヘーゼル
m_vList.DESC: It's Hazel and Wistyria. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Hazel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Student Union President Hazel 2
m_vList.KANA: セイトカイチョウヘーゼル2
m_vList.DESC: Hazel requested you to help replenish the Zettel... Go help her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Zettel" x10 to Hazel in the Academy./Pass the Side Quest of Chapter 11 "Dreams of Each Other" to unlock the recipe of "Zettel".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Mussel Pasta
m_vList.KANA: コウカンムールガイパスタノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Mussel Pasta" x2 for "Good Puni Bun" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Mussel Pasta" x2./The ingredients are "Mussel", "Leek Soup", "Wheat" and "Cod"./"Mussels" can be gained from "Grindylows".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Normal or Above Bomb
m_vList.KANA: コウカンフツウイジョウノフラムノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Normal or above Bomb" x5 for "Good Large Bomb" x5, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Normal or above Bomb" x5./"Large Bombs" can destroy the rocks that Bombs cannot destroy.

m_vList.NAME: [Hunt] Hunt Hobgoblin
m_vList.KANA: トウバツホブゴブリンノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: To prepare for the upcoming strong enemies, go test your strength first. Defeat the "Lower Floor Boss Hobgoblin (Lv.30)" in the "Goblins' Den".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Lower Floor Boss Hobgoblin (Lv.30)" in the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: [Hunt] Hunt Blue Oozes
m_vList.KANA: トウバツブルーウーズフクスウトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: Defeat 5 "Blue Oozes" that appear in broad daylight in Eruleum.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 5 "Blue Oozes" that appear in broad daylight in Eruleum. They can drop the rare material "Blue Cloth Piece", which is a necessary ingredient for gear.

m_vList.NAME: Varerian's Trading
m_vList.KANA: ヴァレリアンノトリヒキ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Lord Rod.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go to the port city of "Lactus"./The port city of "Lactus" is located across the bridge south of the "Lactus Street".

m_vList.NAME: Varerian's Trading 2
m_vList.KANA: ヴァレリアンノトリヒキ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to Ateria to gather some "Fluorspars" for Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Give "Normal or above Fluorspar" x3 to Varerian in the port city of "Lactus"./"Fluorspars" can be gained in the "Hideout of the Dardala Company" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: An Unexpected Side of Mantle
m_vList.KANA: マントルノイガイナイチメン
m_vList.DESC: Go shopping in Eruleum.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go talk to Ladys Mantle at the "Lactus Suburban Square" near the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: An Unexpected Side of Mantle 2
m_vList.KANA: マントルノイガイナイチメン2
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the monster that has appeared near the "Lactus Suburban Square".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat the "Element of Hails Appearing Near the Town" that has appeared only at night near the "Lactus Suburban Square" near the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Blue Cloth Piece
m_vList.KANA: コウカンアオノハギレノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Blue Cloth Piece" x5 for "Good Scotch Egg" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Blue Cloth Piece" x5./They can be gained from the "Blue Oozes" that only appear in the daytime in Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Sea Star
m_vList.KANA: コウカンウミノホシノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Sea Star" x3 for "Good Raw Liquid" x5, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Sea Star" x3./"Sea Stars" can be caught from the fish pool in Eruleum that only appears at night./The reward "Raw Liquid" is an important ingredient for powerful items.

m_vList.NAME: [Hunt] Hunt Giant Red Puni
m_vList.KANA: トウバツデカアカプニノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: To prepare for the upcoming strong enemies, go test your strength first. Defeat the "Middle Floor Boss Giant Red Puni (Lv.30)" in the "Glittering Hill" in Fairyland.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Defeat the "Middle Floor Boss Giant Red Puni (Lv.30)" in the "Glittering Hill".

m_vList.NAME: The Legend of the Mermaid
m_vList.KANA: ニンギョデンセツ
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rod seems to have an unordinary dream. Go ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: The Romance of Traveling
m_vList.KANA: タビノロマン
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rod seems to be helping young people in the port city of "Lactus". Go check what he is up to.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: The Romance of Traveling 2
m_vList.KANA: タビノロマン2
m_vList.DESC: Go replenish the aid supplies distributed by Lord Rod to the travelers.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Give "Normal or above Healing Water" x3 to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: Verbena's Natural Enemies
m_vList.KANA: ベルベイヌノテンテキ
m_vList.DESC: It's said that there is a thing that even the talented and pretty ghost Verbena fears... What is it? Go ask Verbena.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Verbena in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: Verbena's Natural Enemies 2
m_vList.KANA: ベルベイヌノテンテキ2
m_vList.DESC: It seems Verbena is going to fight her natural enemies. Prepare powerful bombs to help her.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Give the "Super or above Bomb" to Verbena in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Sandwich
m_vList.KANA: コウカンサンドウィッチノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Sandwich" x2 for "Good Shepherd's Pie" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Sandwich" x2./The ingredients are "Shrimp", "Yellow Puniball", "Fresh Leaf" and "Bread".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Unmelted Ice
m_vList.KANA: コウカントケナイコオリノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Unmelted Ice" x5 for "Good Polishing Powder" x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Unmelted Ice" x5./They can be gained from the "Elements of Hails" that only appear at night in Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: [Hunt] Hunt Ent
m_vList.KANA: トウバツエントノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: To prepare for the upcoming strong enemies, go test your strength first. Defeat the "Middle Floor Boss Ent (Lv.30)" in the "Ward of Brambles" in Ribrum.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Middle Floor Boss Ent (Lv.30)" in the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: Beloved One
m_vList.KANA: イトシノアノヒト
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rod was refused by Amaryllis... Is he all right? Go check on him.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Golden Rod in the port city of "Lactus".

m_vList.NAME: Beloved One 2
m_vList.KANA: イトシノアノヒト2
m_vList.DESC: It turns out that Lord Rod is "that handsome man" Amaryllis was talking about. Anyway, go find Amaryllis to confirm it.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Amaryllis in the "Kanaris Coast"./The "Kanaris Coast" is beyond the east side of the "Lactus Street".

m_vList.NAME: [Trial] Undersea Shrine Aes Regia
m_vList.KANA: シレンカイテイシンデンアエスレギア
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Upper Floor Boss Nuckelavee"./[Special Reward] Unlock the middle floors of the dungeon (11F–20F) and the lower floors of the dungeon (21F–30F).
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Go defeat the "Upper Floor Boss Nuckelavee" on 10F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Fresh Meat
m_vList.KANA: コウカンシンセンナニクノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Fresh Meat" x5 for "Good Sea Star" x5, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Fresh Meat" x5./"Fresh Meat" can be gained from the "Sea Minks" in the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Bomb Liquid
m_vList.KANA: コウカンフラリキッドノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Bomb Liquid" x5 for "Good Ice Bomb Liquid" x5, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Bomb Liquid" x5./The ingredients are "Raw Liquid", "Red Neutralizer" and "Lava Ore"./One of the ingredients for "Raw Liquid" is the "Mermaid's Tear" gathered in the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Raw Liquid
m_vList.KANA: コウカンリキッドゲンエキノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the "Raw Liquid" and deliver it. It can be exchanged for the "Snake's Shed Skin" with a quality of 60 (★3), which is an ingredient for Eruleum gear, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Try to synthesize the "Raw Liquid". The ingredients are "Unmelted Ice", "Mermaid's Tear" and "Frog Egg".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Ring of Eruleum
m_vList.KANA: コウカンエルレウムノユビワ
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Ring of Eruleum" x1 for "Good Silver Ingot" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Ring of Eruleum" x1./The ingredients are "Mermaid's Tear", "Beast Horn" and "Polishing Powder"./"Beast Horns" can be gained from "Aillén mac Midna", the Boss of "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" 20F.

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.45
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル45
m_vList.DESC: [Multi Battle] Go defeat the disastrous monster that has appeared on 5F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Defeat the "Disastrous Monster" that has appeared on 5F of the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia"./The monster will appear no matter you choose the "Solo" or the "Multi" option.

m_vList.NAME: Food That Amaryllis Likes
m_vList.KANA: アマリリスノコウブツ
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Amaryllis.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Talk to Amaryllis on the "Kanaris Coast".

m_vList.NAME: Food That Amaryllis Likes 2
m_vList.KANA: アマリリスノコウブツ2
m_vList.DESC: Amaryllis likes "Unis"? Bring some to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Eruleum] Give "Normal or above Uni" x3 to Amaryllis on the "Kanaris Coast".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Ancient Water
m_vList.KANA: コウカンタイコノミズノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Ancient Water" x5 for "Good Beast Horn" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Ancient Water" x5./Use an Ice Bomb to freeze the river in the "Mermaid Rock" and gain the "Ancient Water".

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Mace of Eruleum
m_vList.KANA: コウカンエルレウムノメイスノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Mace of Eruleum" x1 for "Gacha Ticket" x1, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Mace of Eruleum" x1./The ingredients are "Mermaid's Tear", "Twisted Horn", "Silver Ingot" and "Rotten Bone"./"Twisted Horns" can be gained from "Pialays", the Boss of "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia" 30F.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Time Reversal
m_vList.KANA: コウカンジカンヨモドレノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange "Time Reversal" x3 for the recipe of the accessory "Face Veil", one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Time Reversal" x3./The ingredients are "Ancient Water", "Book of Magic", "Silver Ingot" and "Floating Lantern"./One of the ingredients for "Silver Ingot" is the "Sea Star" that can be caught from the fish pool in Eruleum that only appears at night.

m_vList.NAME: [Exchange] Deliver Sword of Eruleum

m_vList.NAME: Prologue
m_vList.KANA: プロローグ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Peppermint who is brushing her feathers in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヘ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Ruhuna to gather the information about the Dragons.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the entrance of "Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: Damage to Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラノヒガイ
m_vList.DESC: To repel the large number of monsters that have appeared in Ruhuna, go synthesize the monster repellent items and send them to Bilberry in Ruhuna Village.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Send "Frightening Uni" x2 to Bilberry in "Ruhuna"./The ingredients are "Fairy Butter", "Mandragora Root" and "Uni".

m_vList.NAME: The Monsters Attacking Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヲオソウマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Help eliminate the large number of monsters that have appeared in Ruhuna.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the "Entrance of Ruhuna" near the entrance of the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: The Monsters Attacking Ruhuna Village 2
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヲオソウマモノ２
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the large number of monsters that have appeared in Ruhuna.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Apostle (Lv.25)" that has appeared at the "Entrance of Ruhuna".

m_vList.NAME: The Incident of Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムノイヘン
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Tandrion who is preparing in a hurry in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Tandrion in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヘ
m_vList.DESC: The monsters in Ribrum seem to have become active. Go to Rose Hip Mansion to collect the information first.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion".

m_vList.NAME: Mimi, the Adventurer from Another World
m_vList.KANA: イセカイノボウケンシャミミ
m_vList.DESC: Give the "Healing Water" to Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Give the "Healing Water" to Mimi at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion"./Gain a "Glittering Dew Drop" in Ateria to unlock the recipe.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster Attacking Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヲオソウマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Find the monster that wounded Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the "Entrance of the Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: The Monster Attacking Ribrum 2
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヲオソウマモノ２
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that wounded Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Alien Dragon" that has appeared at the "Entrance of the Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: The Incident of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノイヘン
m_vList.DESC: Ru and Sterk are talking about something in the Academy, looking serious. Go ask them what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアヘ
m_vList.DESC: It seems the Dardala Company is watching over the Dragon that has appeared in Ateria. Go ask Scalcap about the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the "Trading House". The "Trading House" is located at the center of the town of "Gooru" in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Prepare for the Dragon Hunt
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツニソナエテ
m_vList.DESC: Get prepared for the Dragon hunt while investigating it.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Give "Ice Bomb" x5 with a quality of at least 50 to Scalcap in the "Trading House".

m_vList.NAME: Confronting the Dragon
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントノタイメン
m_vList.DESC: Go to the place where the Dardala Company is watching over the Dragon.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to "Rupes Deserted Mine" 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Space-Time Distortion and the Monster
m_vList.KANA: ジクウノユガミトマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that appeared due to the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat the "Apostle (Lv.30)" that has appeared on 5F of the "Rupes Deserted Mine".

m_vList.NAME: Go to Fairyland
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイキョウヘ
m_vList.DESC: Ru may know something about the scales dropped by the Dragon. Talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Words of the Fairy King
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイオウノハナシ
m_vList.DESC: The Fairy King may know how to defeat the Dragon. Go ask the Fairy King Thunbergia in Fairyland.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Talk to the Fairy King Thunbergia sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne".

m_vList.NAME: Test of the Fairy King
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイオウカラノシキンセキ
m_vList.DESC: Challenge the assignment from the Fairy King Thunbergia and show your real strength.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Give the "Warrior's Secret Potion" with a quality of at least 60 to the Fairy King Thunbergia sitting on the "Fairy King's Throne".

m_vList.NAME: In Order to Make the Item
m_vList.KANA: ドウグヲツクルタメニ
m_vList.DESC: To make the item used to seal the Dragon's power, go awaken the sealed monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Go to "Glittering Hill" 30F.

m_vList.NAME: In Order to Make the Item 2
m_vList.KANA: ドウグヲツクルタメニ２
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the sealed "Alien Demon" and gain the item.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Fairyland] Defeat the "Alien Demon (Lv.40)" on 30F of the "Glittering Hill".

m_vList.NAME: Make the Trump Card
m_vList.KANA: キリフダノサクセイ
m_vList.DESC: Everyone in the Academy is busy preparing for the Dragon hunt operation. Go find Ru to get the update.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Complete the Trump Card
m_vList.KANA: キリフダノカンセイ
m_vList.DESC: Complete the trump card to defeat the Dragon. This weapon can seal the Dragon's power.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Valkyrie Arm" to Peppermint in the Academy./The ingredients can be checked from the recipe. One of the ingredients "Evil Horn" can be gained from "Alien Demons" on 30F of the "Glittering Hill" in Fairyland.

m_vList.NAME: Go to the Dragon's Den
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴンノスヘ
m_vList.DESC: Everything is ready to defeat the Dragon. Go to its den now before it causes more damage.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the entrance of the Arter Tunnel on the "Mountain Path".

m_vList.NAME: The Depths of the Den
m_vList.KANA: スノオクチデ
m_vList.DESC: You can feel the growing Dragon's power. The Dragon is right there...
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Go to the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the "Mountain Path".

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴンノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the source of the abnormalities in Bressisle—the Dragon "Iguanas".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat "Iguanas (Lv.50)" in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the "Mountain Path".

m_vList.NAME: Ending
m_vList.KANA: エピローグ
m_vList.DESC: Now that the Dragon is defeated, everything should have returned to normal and Bressisle should have regained peace... But there seems to be some disturbance in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon Lv.1
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツ Lv1
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the Dragon "Iguanas (Lv.50)". ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat "Iguanas (Lv.50)" in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the "Mountain Path".

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon Lv.2
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツ Lv2
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the Dragon "Iguanas (Lv.70)". ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ateria] Defeat "Iguanas (Lv.70)" in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the "Mountain Path".

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Valkyrie Arm
m_vList.KANA: ヴァルキリーアームノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Valkyrie Arm" with a quality of 100. ※Only once.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver the "Valkyrie Arm" with a quality of 100.

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Mace of Albus
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Mace of Albus" with a quality of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver a "Mace of Albus" with a quality of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from "Hobgoblins" on 30F of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Mace of Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Mace of Ribrum" with a quality of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver a "Mace of Ribrum" with a quality of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from "Apple Treemen" on 30F of the "Ward of Brambles".

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Mace of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Mace of Ateria" with a quality of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver a "Mace of Ateria" with a quality of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from "Queen Spiders" on 30F of the "Hideout of the Dardala Company".

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Mace of Fairyland
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイキョウのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Mace of Fairyland" with a quality of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver a "Mace of Fairyland" with a quality of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from "Giant Yellow Punis" on 30F of the "Glittering Hill".

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Mace of Eruleum
m_vList.KANA: エルレウムのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Deliver the "Mace of Eruleum" with a quality of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver a "Mace of Eruleum" with a quality of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from "Pialays" on 30F of the "Undersea Shrine".

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.1 Lv.15
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム1　レベル15
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.15 - Wind Dragon". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.15 - Wind Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 1,000].

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.1 Lv.50
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム1　レベル50
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.50 - Wind Dragon". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Wind Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 5,000].

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.1 Lv.80
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム1　レベル80
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.80 - Wind Dragon". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.80 - Wind Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 8,000].

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.2 Lv.10
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム2　レベル10
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.10 - Clown". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.10 - Clown" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 500]/The enemy will use the "Flare Zone", please use the "Aqua Zone" to fight against it!/Please defeat its surrounding Bandits using all-target attacks or other means.

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.2 Lv.50
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム2　レベル50
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.50 - Clown". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Clown" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 5,000]/The enemy will use the "Flare Zone", please use the "Aqua Zone" to fight against it!/Please defeat its surrounding Bandits using all-target attacks or other means.

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.2 Lv.80
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム2　レベル80
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.80 - Clown". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.80 - Clown" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 8,000]/The enemy will use the "Flare Zone", please use the "Aqua Zone" to fight against it!/Please defeat its surrounding Bandits using all-target attacks or other means.

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.3 Lv.10
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム3　レベル10
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.10 - Green Golem". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.10 - Green Golem" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 500]/The enemy will use the "Earth Zone", please use the "Wind Zone" to fight against it!/The enemy will greatly increase its DEF, so please use skills such as "Poison" to deal damage.

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle Vol.3 Lv.50
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム3　レベル50
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.50 - Green Golem". Check the "Notice" so that you can gain a high rating more efficiently. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Green Golem" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 5,000]/The enemy will use the "Earth Zone", please use the "Wind Zone" to fight against it!/The enemy will greatly increase its DEF, so please use skills such as "Poison" to deal damage.

m_vList.NAME: [Win Ingredients] The Efficacy of Leeks
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウリーキシュウシュウカ
m_vList.DESC: Cooking, treating colds, viewing... You can never have too many leeks, so bring plenty of them!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Leek" x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Win Ingredients] Uni Throw Contest
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウウニナゲノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: I lost to the "Goblin" in the Uni Throw Contest... I must win this time, so please bring me some Unis for practice!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Uni" x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Win Ingredients] Grilling Beast Meat
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウケモノノニクノヤキカゲン
m_vList.DESC: Uh... The meat quickly became charred. Please prepare some Beast Meat to make sure it's perfectly cooked.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Beast Meat" x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Win Ingredients] Research on Red Puniballs
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウアカプニダマケンキュウ
m_vList.DESC: We are investigating on the difference between the Red Puniball and the Blue Puniball. Please bring some Red Puniballs to prevent mistakes due to individual differences.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Red Puniball" x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] The Leek Collector
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウリーキシュウシュウカ
m_vList.DESC: Young leeks, vintage leeks, and even dying leeks are all wonderful and unique... I don't care what kind, just show me many leeks!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Leek" x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] For Piling Up Unis
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウウニツミノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: The "Goblin" piled up many Unis, which looks fun. Please bring many of them for me to play!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Uni" x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] Stock Up
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウオミセノシイレ
m_vList.DESC: I've been grilling and selling meat, but lately it's been lacking in impact. Bring me some meat that I can sell as a new product!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Beast Meat" x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] Further Research on Red Puniballs
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウアカプニダマツイキュウ
m_vList.DESC: Puni Puni, Puni Puni Puni Puni... Hah, this is a big study! Please bring me more Red Puniballs for further research!!
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Red Puniball" x7.

m_vList.NAME: Deliver Good Uni Pouch

m_vList.DESC: Deliver the good "Uni Pouch". ※You can still challenge this quest the next day or later after clearing or abandoning this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Deliver "Uni Pouch" x1 with a quality of at least 60./"Unis" can be gathered from trees and grass./Good "Cloth Pieces" can be gained from Commission Quests.

m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 "Imps"./They can be found in Fairyland.

m_vList.NAME: Breakthrough Quest~ Ateria~

m_vList.NAME: Breakthrough Quest~ Eruleum~

m_vList.NAME: Breakthrough Quest~ Flares~

m_vList.NAME: [Strength Testing] Puni Zaemon
m_vList.KANA: ウデダメシプニザエモン
m_vList.DESC: A Puni which is said to be "the strongest among Punis" is puni-puniing at the entrance of the Academy. Let's see how much damage we can deal.
m_vList.CONDITION: Compete with the "Puni Zaemon" that has appeared at of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: The Alchemist from the Kurken Island
m_vList.KANA: クーケントウノレンキンジュツシ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Ryza, a girl coming to the Academy through the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Bewitching???
m_vList.KANA: ミワクノ？？？
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Ryza, who looks quite hungry... Do you feel someone is staring at you?
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Bewitching??? 2
m_vList.KANA: ミワクノ？？？２
m_vList.DESC: Give the "Leather" to Ryza so she can fix her broken boots.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Leather" x3 to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Help with the Harvest
m_vList.KANA: シュウカクノテツダイヲ
m_vList.DESC: Ryza seems boring. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Practicing Alchemy
m_vList.KANA: レンキンジュツレンシュウチュウ
m_vList.DESC: Ryza seems very upset. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Academy Renovation Plan
m_vList.KANA: アカデミーカイゾウケイカク
m_vList.DESC: Ryza seems boring again. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Academy Renovation Plan 2
m_vList.KANA: アカデミーカイゾウケイカク２
m_vList.DESC: Give the "Puni Ball" to Ryza so she can renovate the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Puni Ball" x3 (quality 60) to Ryza in the Academy./The ingredients are "Puniball" and "Tree's Rattan".

m_vList.NAME: The Relic and the Ancient Tool
m_vList.KANA: イブツトコシキヒグ
m_vList.DESC: Ryza is looking at Anise and Ru Sensei. Let's see what's going on.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: An Exciting Adventure
m_vList.KANA: ムネガオドルボウケンヲ
m_vList.DESC: Ryza is calling you. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ryza in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: An Exciting Adventure 2
m_vList.KANA: ムネガオドルボウケンヲ２
m_vList.DESC: Go out for a walk with Ryza.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: The Marvelous Alchemist
m_vList.KANA: フシギナレンキンジュツシ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Sophie, a girl coming to the Academy through the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie and the Marvelous Book
m_vList.KANA: ソフィートフシギナホン
m_vList.DESC: Peppermint seems to be making a fuss about something...? Go check out what's going on.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie and the Marvelous Book 2
m_vList.KANA: ソフィートフシギナホン２
m_vList.DESC: Give "Fish Scale" x3 to Sophie, who wants to synthesize the items of this world.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Fish Scale" x3 to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be looking at the bulletin board...? Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At 2
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ２
m_vList.DESC: It seems Sophie has accepted a commission of killing monsters which she is not good at. We can't leave her alone. Go to the "Lost Woods" to help her kill the monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the "Lost Woods" in Albus.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At 3
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ３
m_vList.DESC: The monster of the commission has appeared in the "Lost Woods". Defeat the "Banshee" for the scared Sophie.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Bitter Banshee" in the "Lost Woods" in Albus.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be troubled by something? Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes 2
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン２
m_vList.DESC: Sophie wants to think up many recipes for her friends. To broaden the view, go to the entrance of the "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the entrance of the "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes 3
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン３
m_vList.DESC: You went to the entrance of the "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum with Sophie, and got attacked by a group of Punis! There is no other choice, let's kill the "Red Punis"!
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Group-Living Red Punis" at the entrance of the "Rosa Maze" in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie's Hometown
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノコキョウ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be doing some research. Go talk to her and see how is it going.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie's Eureka Moment
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノヒラメキ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems upset gain. Maybe she has some trouble, let's go ask her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie's Eureka Moment 2
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノヒラメキ２
m_vList.DESC: Sophie wants to make an alchemical cauldron. Make an alchemical cauldron...? Although it puzzles you, let's prepare the material "Silver Ingot" for her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Silver Ingot" x2 (quality 60 or above) to Sophie in the Academy./The ingredients are "Sea Star", "Mermaid's Tear", "Scrap Iron" and "Iron Ingot".

m_vList.NAME: The Alchemy of Happiness
m_vList.KANA: シアワセノレンキンジュツ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie keeps staring at the newly made alchemical cauldron. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Alchemy of Happiness 2
m_vList.KANA: シアワセノレンキンジュツ２
m_vList.DESC: It seems Sophie wants to synthesize an incredible item. Help her get the material "Earth Dragon's Secret Potion".
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the good "Earth Dragon's Secret Potion" (quality 60 or above) to Sophie in the Academy./The ingredients are "Yellow Neutralizer", "Mandragora Root" and "Rotten Bone".

m_vList.NAME: The Curry Alchemist?
m_vList.KANA: カレーナルレンキンジュツシ？
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Lulua, a girl with a dim smell of curry, who has come to the Academy through the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Riddle and the Girl
m_vList.KANA: リドルトショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua seems to be staring at a book. Go ask her what she is reading.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: It'll All Work Out!
m_vList.KANA: ナントカナルナル！
m_vList.DESC: Lulua's mantra is "it'll all work out!". Go ask her about this mantra.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Aesthetic Curry
m_vList.KANA: タンビナルカレーヲモトメテ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua is looking at us. It seems she needs some help. Go ask her about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Aesthetic Curry 2
m_vList.KANA: タンビナルカレーヲモトメテ２
m_vList.DESC: To help Lulua who wishes to know the curry of this world, give her the "Fully-Ripe Apple", the classic and secret ingredient for the curry.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the "Fully-Ripe Apple" to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: A Young Mother!?
m_vList.KANA: トシシタノオカアサン！？
m_vList.DESC: Lulua is in the Academy and seems very happy. Go ask her how is she doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Elegant Curry
m_vList.KANA: ユウガナルカレーヲモトメテ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua has an extremely mysterious look on her face. Go ash her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Elegant Curry 2
m_vList.KANA: ユウガナルカレーヲモトメテ２
m_vList.DESC: Lulua wants to discover the essence of curry. Give her the secret ingredient "Comfrey" that she wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Comfrey" x3 to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Spice of Affinity
m_vList.KANA: キズナノスパイス
m_vList.DESC: Lulua seems to be worrying about something. It's probably about the curry. Just in case, let's ask her what's wrong.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Spice of Affinity 2
m_vList.KANA: キズナノスパイス２
m_vList.DESC: Give the ingredient "Leek Soup" to Lulua, who wants to make the best curry in the world.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Leek Soup" (quality 60) x3 to Lulua in the Academy./The ingredients are "Leek" and "Salmon".

m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.KANA: ロロナノウデマエ

m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Rose Petal" x3 to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.
