m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.10 - Chocolate Puni". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.10 - Chocolate Puni" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 5,000]/The enemy will use the "Aqua Zone", please use the "Flare Zone" to fight against it!/Its companion will use recovery skills, so please defeat it asap.

m_vList.NAME: Ticket Descent Battle (Light) Vol.6 Lv.50
m_vList.KANA: チケットコウリンバトルライトボリューム6　レベル５０
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.50 - Chocolate Puni". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Chocolate Puni" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 20,000]/The enemy will use the "Aqua Zone", please use the "Flare Zone" to fight against it!/Its companion will use recovery skills, so please defeat it asap.

m_vList.NAME: Ticket Descent Battle (Light) Vol.6 Lv.80
m_vList.KANA: チケットコウリンバトルライトボリューム6　レベル８０
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.80 - Chocolate Puni". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.80 - Chocolate Puni" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 25,000]/The enemy will use the "Aqua Zone", please use the "Flare Zone" to fight against it!/Its companion will use recovery skills, so please defeat it asap.

m_vList.NAME: The Princess of Arls
m_vList.KANA: アールズノオヒメサマ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Meruru, an alchemist coming to the Academy through the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Princess Is a Tomboy?
m_vList.KANA: オヒメサマハオテンバ
m_vList.DESC: Meruru seems to be looking for you. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Princess Is a Tomboy? 2
m_vList.KANA: オヒメサマハオテンバ２
m_vList.DESC: Go with Meruru to check the situation of the monster that has appeared at the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".

m_vList.NAME: The Princess Is a Tomboy? 3
m_vList.KANA: オヒメサマハオテンバ３
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the "Wolf" that has appeared at the entrance of "Ruhuna Village" with Meruru.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Wolf" at the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".

m_vList.NAME: Meruru's Brilliant Idea
m_vList.KANA: メルルノミョウアン
m_vList.DESC: Meruru seems to be very happy. Go ask her what's the good news.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Power of Items
m_vList.KANA: ドウグノチカラ
m_vList.DESC: Meruru seems to be synthesizing something. Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Ent and the Ent
m_vList.KANA: エントトエント
m_vList.DESC: Meruru seems to be in a fluster. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Ent and the Ent 2
m_vList.KANA: エントトエント２
m_vList.DESC: Go with the flustered Meruru to check the situation of the "Ent" that has appeared in the "Lost Woods".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: The Ent and the Ent 3
m_vList.KANA: エントトエント３
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the "Ent" that has appeared in the "Lost Woods" with Meruru.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Ent" in the "Lost Woods".

m_vList.NAME: The Crown and the Pride
m_vList.KANA: オウカントキョウジ
m_vList.DESC: Meruru is also active in the Academy. Let's see how is she doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Crown and the Pride 2
m_vList.KANA: オウカントキョウジ２
m_vList.DESC: Give the good "Iron Ingot" to Meruru to fixed the crown worn.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Iron Ingot" (quality 60) x3 to Meruru in the Academy./The ingredients are "Iron Ore", "Heavy Ore" and "Fluorspars".

m_vList.NAME: The Future of Arls
m_vList.KANA: アールズノアシタ
m_vList.DESC: Meruru is also full of vigor today. Talk to the energetic Meruru.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Meruru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Descent Battle (Light) Vol.7 Intro
m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルライトボリューム7イントロ
m_vList.DESC: It's said that a student will introduce the details of this Descent Battle. Go listen to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to the male student in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Daily Descent Battle (Light) Vol.7 Lv.1
m_vList.KANA: デイリーコウリンバトルライトボリューム7　レベル１
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.1 - Storm Dragon". ※You can still challenge this quest the next day or later after clearing or abandoning this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.1 - Storm Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 1,000]/The enemy will use the "Wind Zone", please use the "Earth Zone" to fight against it!/Please use the Paralysis status to effectively block the enemy's movements.

m_vList.KANA: デイリーコウリンバトルライトボリューム7　レベル５０

m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Storm Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 20,000]/The enemy will use the "Wind Zone", please use the "Earth Zone" to fight against it!/Please use the Paralysis status to effectively block the enemy's movements.

m_vList.KANA: チケットコウリンバトルライトボリューム7　レベル１０
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.10 - Storm Dragon". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.10 - Storm Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 5,000]/The enemy will use the "Wind Zone", please use the "Earth Zone" to fight against it!/Please use the Paralysis status to effectively block the enemy's movements.

m_vList.NAME: Ticket Descent Battle (Light) Vol.7 Lv.50
m_vList.KANA: チケットコウリンバトルライトボリューム7　レベル５０
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.50 - Storm Dragon". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.50 - Storm Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 20,000]/The enemy will use the "Wind Zone", please use the "Earth Zone" to fight against it!/Please use the Paralysis status to effectively block the enemy's movements.

m_vList.NAME: Ticket Descent Battle (Light) Vol.7 Lv.80
m_vList.KANA: チケットコウリンバトルライトボリューム7　レベル８０
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss "Descent Lv.80 - Storm Dragon". ※"Descent Tickets" needed. ※"Descent Tickets" can be bought from the Shop.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the "Descent Lv.80 - Storm Dragon" of the Descent Battle. [Recommended Strength: at least 25,000]/The enemy will use the "Wind Zone", please use the "Earth Zone" to fight against it!/Please use the Paralysis status to effectively block the enemy's movements.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel Auseil
m_vList.KANA: ソレルオーゼイユ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Auseil, a girl in man's clothes who has come here through the space-time distortion and looks like Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク１
m_vList.DESC: Auseil is beckoning us. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power 2
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク２
m_vList.DESC: To help Auseil with the monster hunt commission, go check the monster at the entrance of the "Goblins' Den".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the entrance of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power 3
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク３
m_vList.DESC: To help Auseil with the monster hunt commission, defeat the "Fierce Ooze" at the entrance of the "Goblins' Den".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Fierce Ooze" at the entrance of the "Goblins' Den".

m_vList.NAME: Auseil's Accelerant
m_vList.KANA: オーゼイユノショクバイ
m_vList.DESC: Auseil is looking for you. She seems to need your help with something. Go ask her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Auseil's Accelerant 2
m_vList.KANA: オーゼイユノショクバイ２
m_vList.DESC: Give "Fresh Leaf" x5, which can be used as a magic accelerant, to Auseil.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give "Fresh Leaf" x5 to Auseil.

m_vList.NAME: Courting Publicity and the Opera
m_vList.KANA: メダチタガリトゲキ
m_vList.DESC: For some reason, Auseil is practicing her vocalizations. Let's ask her what she's doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ１
m_vList.DESC: Sorel and Auseil seem to be talking. Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price 2
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ２
m_vList.DESC: Sorel wants to observe how Auseil uses her magic in a close range. Go to the entrance of "Rosa Maze" to see if there is any suitable monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of the "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price 3
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ３
m_vList.DESC: To observe Auseil's magic, fight with the "Rosa Wolf" at the entrance of the "Rosa Maze".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the "Rosa Wolf" at the entrance of the "Rosa Maze".

m_vList.NAME: The Source of the Magic Power
m_vList.KANA: マリョクノミナモト１
m_vList.DESC: Auseil is beckoning us again. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Source of the Magic Power 2
m_vList.KANA: マリョクノミナモト２
m_vList.DESC: The source of Auseil's magic power is delicious food. Let's give her top-class "Fish&Chips".
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Fish&Chips" (quality 60) x3 to Auseil in the Academy./The ingredients are "Cod", "Potato" and "Wheat".

m_vList.NAME: Auseil's Guidance
m_vList.KANA: オーゼイユノミチビキ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel and Auseil are talking again. Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Anise Phonic
m_vList.KANA: アニス・フォニク
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Phonic, a girl in man's clothes who has come here through the space-time distortion and looks like Anise.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク
m_vList.DESC: Phonic seems impatient. Ask her what's wrong.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World 2
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク２
m_vList.DESC: To investigate the difference between the world that Phonic lived in and this world, go to "Ruhuna Village".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World 3
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク３
m_vList.DESC: You and Phonic met a monster when doing the fieldwork. Eliminate the "Big Ruhuna Frog" at the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Big Ruhuna Frog" at the entrance of "Ruhuna Village".

m_vList.NAME: Phonic's Sword
m_vList.KANA: フォニクノケン
m_vList.DESC: Phonic seems to be quite skilled in swordplay. Ask her about her swordplay.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Her Voice, Loud and Clear
m_vList.KANA: ソノコエ、タカラカニ
m_vList.DESC: Phonic seems to be practicing vocalizations. Ask her what she is doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Phonic
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャフォニク
m_vList.DESC: It seems Ru wants to ask you a favor. Ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Phonic 2
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャフォニク２
m_vList.DESC: Ru wants the "Book of Magic" for research. It's requested by Phonic. Give him the good "Book of Magic".
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Book of Magic" x1 (quality 60) to Ru./The ingredients are "Japanese Ash Branch", "Puniball?", "Heath Grass" and "Water Lily".

m_vList.NAME: Phonic and the Study Group
m_vList.KANA: フォニクトベンキョウカイ
m_vList.DESC: It seems Anise wants to talk to Phonic. To create a chance for her, go talk to Phonic.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Phonic and the Study Group 2
m_vList.KANA: フォニクトベンキョウカイ２
m_vList.DESC: Give the good "Wizard's Secret Potion" to Anise and Phonic as the material of their study group.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Wizard's Secret Potion" x1 (quality 60) to Phonic./The ingredients are "Taun", "Yellow Neutralizer" and "Plum".

m_vList.NAME: The Thing That Won't Betray
m_vList.KANA: ウラギラナイモノ
m_vList.DESC: Anise seems to have come up with the answer to the homework from Phonic. Let's go to Phonic together.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Swordsman Aiming to Be the Strongest
m_vList.KANA: サイキョウヲメザスケンシ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel, the swordsman with a spiky hairstyle who has come here through the space-time distortion, seems to have a certain goal. Go talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: A Child's Sense of Taste?
m_vList.KANA: ミカクハオコチャマ？
m_vList.DESC: It seems Peppermint is making a fuss about being hungry. Go ask her before she rampages.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Unique Swordplay
m_vList.KANA: ドクトクノケンギ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is practicing his swordplay. Talk to him so we can watch him practice.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is standing in front of the bulletin board. Go ask him what's he looking at.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility 2
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム２
m_vList.DESC: Head south from the "Entrance of the Academy" with Aurel toward the river to eliminate the monsters of the commission.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility 3
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム３
m_vList.DESC: Eliminate the monster that has appeared in the vicinity of the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy", with Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Albus] Defeat the "Petit Imp" that has appeared in the vicinity of the river, south of the "Entrance of the Academy".

m_vList.NAME: Aurel's Training
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is looking for you. Go ask him what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Aurel's Training 2
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン２
m_vList.DESC: Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" to see the training of Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion".

m_vList.NAME: Aurel's Training 3
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン３
m_vList.DESC: Aurel's training is defeating monsters incessantly!? As expected, he is outnumbered. Go defeat the monster at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion" with Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat "Metal Puni" at the entrance of "Rose Hip Mansion".

m_vList.NAME: The Cherished Sword
m_vList.KANA: トッテオキノケン
m_vList.DESC: It seems Aurel wants to ask you a favor. Ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Cherished Sword 2
m_vList.KANA: トッテオキノケン２
m_vList.DESC: To get the sword that Aurel cherishes, give him good "Warrior's Secret Potion" x3.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good "Warrior's Secret Potion" (quality 60) x3 to Aurel in the Academy./The ingredients are "Taun", "Yellow Neutralizer" and "Mushroom".

m_vList.NAME: Aiming to Be the Strongest
m_vList.KANA: サイキョウヲミスエテ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel called you. He looks meeker than usual, let's talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.
